pageContent:
Schedule 6.1 
 
Contingent Worker Non-Disclosure and Assignment of Work product Agreement 
 
CONTINGENT WORKER NON-DISCLOSURE AND ASSIGNMENT OF WORK 
PRODUCT AGREEMENT 
 
This Non-Disclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered 
into as of ____________ (date) by {Insert Name of the Correct Genpact legal entity in US 
deploying the resource}. (hereinafter referred to as “Genpact”, which terms will also include 
Genpact’s divisions, subsidiaries, affiliates, successor and assigns), and _______ (“Contingent 
Worker ”).   
 
Genpact and Contingent Worker are referred to collectively in this Agreement as the “Parties.” 
 
WHEREAS, Contingent Worker is employed/ engaged by ........................................ [Supplier 
Name] (“Supplier”).  
 
WHEREAS, the Supplier has been engaged to provide certain services to Genpact.  
 
WHEREAS, this Agreement is entered into as a result of the Contingent Worker being deployed

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

pageContent:
Name] (“Supplier”).  
 
WHEREAS, the Supplier has been engaged to provide certain services to Genpact.  
 
WHEREAS, this Agreement is entered into as a result of the Contingent Worker being deployed 
by the Supplier to providing services to Genpact.  While providing services, Contingent Worker 
will be provided with information and/or documents and may be exposed and have access to 
information and/or documents which are “Confidential Information,” defined herein to include, 
but not limited to: 
 
 proprietary information relating to Genpact or its client’s business practices, 
processes, strategies, and technologies; 
 
 the name and identity of any Genpact client that Contingent Worker may come to 
learn;  
 
 confidential and proprietary information supplied to Contingent Worker with the 
legend “Genpact Confidential and Proprietary” or equivalent, Genpact Master 
Services Agreements with clients, Genpact marketing and customer support strategies,

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

_metadata.dc:creator: JNafsu

pageContent:
legend “Genpact Confidential and Proprietary” or equivalent, Genpact Master 
Services Agreements with clients, Genpact marketing and customer support strategies, 
Genpact financial information, including sales, costs, profits and pricing methods, 
Genpact internal organization documents, employee lists and customer lists, Genpact 
technology, including discoveries, inventions, research and development efforts, 
manufacturing processes, hardware/software design and maintenance tools, product 
know-how and show-how, and all derivatives, improvements and enhancements to any 
of the above which are created or developed by Contingent Worker under this 
Agreement; and; 
 
 confidential or proprietary information from Genpact employees, clients, customers or 
any other third party to which Genpact has an obligation of confidentiality 
(collectively, “Confidential Information”).  
 
Confidential Information may be written, oral, recorded, or on tapes, disks or other electronic

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

_metadata.dc:creator: JNafsu

pageContent:
(collectively, “Confidential Information”).  
 
Confidential Information may be written, oral, recorded, or on tapes, disks or other electronic 
media. Because of the sensitive nature of the information that Contingent Worker may become 
aware of as a result of his deployment to Genpact, the intent of the Parties is that these 
provisions be interpreted as broadly as possible to protect the Confidential Information. 
 
And will work or deal with “Work product” defined below as:

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

info.Title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected
info.Author: JNafsu

_metadata.dc:title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected
_metadata.dc:creator: JNafsu

pageContent:
Work Product: 
 
 Any tangible or intangible work or invention, whether copyrightable, patentable or not, 
and all related know-how, designs, mask works, trademarks, formulae, processes, 
manufacturing techniques, trade secrets, ideas, artwork, software, or any other result of 
work done for Customer by a Supplier, SOW Worker, or Contingent Worker, all of 
which will be considered “work made for hire” owned by and for the benefit of 
Customer. 
 
THEREFORE, Contingent Worker agrees to the following provisions for non-disclosure, non-
use, and non-competition as to the Confidential Information: 
 
1. Contingent Worker acknowledges that all Confidential Information is considered proprietary 
and confidential and is a matter of strict confidentiality. 
 
2. Contingent Worker agrees that any Confidential Information will be used solely for the 
purpose of carrying out his/her services for Genpact.

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

info.Title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected
info.Author: JNafsu
info.Creator: PScript5.dll Version 5.2.2

_metadata.dc:title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected
_metadata.dc:creator: JNafsu

pageContent:
2. Contingent Worker agrees that any Confidential Information will be used solely for the 
purpose of carrying out his/her services for Genpact. 
 
3. Contingent Worker will not make copies of any Confidential Information for any purpose, 
unless he/she obtains prior written permission from Genpact. 
 
4. Contingent Worker will protect all Confidential Information and prevent the unauthorized 
use, dissemination or publication of the Confidential Information. 
 
5.  Upon  completion  of  any  demonstration/training  Contingent  Worker  will  return  all 
Confidential  
Information to Genpact. 
 
6. At the end of tenure of service, Contingent Worker will immediately return to Genpact any 
and all Confidential Information, as well as any copies or reproductions thereof relating to 
Genpact and its Customers. Contingent Worker will, at such time, provide Genpact with a 
signed certificate verifying that all such Confidential Information has been returned to Genpact.

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

info.Title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected

_metadata.dc:title: Microsoft Word - Genpact_Supplier Master Services Agreement_FINAL_unprotected
_metadata.dc:creator: JNafsu

pageContent:
Genpact and its Customers. Contingent Worker will, at such time, provide Genpact with a 
signed certificate verifying that all such Confidential Information has been returned to Genpact. 
 
7. The obligations set forth in paragraphs 1 through 6 above will not apply to Confidential 
Information which: 
 
a) has become public; 
 
b) was disclosed to Contingent Worker by a third party not under an obligation of 
confidentiality; 
 
c) was independently developed by Contingent Worker not otherwise in violation or 
breach of this Agreement or any other confidentiality obligation; 
 
d) was rightfully known to Contingent worker prior to entering into this Agreement 
without obligation of confidentiality; and 
 
e) any disclosure specifically authorized in writing by Genpact 
 
8.  This  Agreement  is  effective  upon  the  date  first  written  above  or  upon  the  date  when 
Confidential Information was or is disclosed, whichever occurs first.

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

pageContent:
9. Contingent Worker agrees that all Confidential Information received will at all times remain 
the sole property of Genpact. Contingent Worker will return any and all Confidential  
 
Information  to  Genpact  immediately  upon  demand  or  upon  closure of  deployment  of   
Contingent Worker’s services.  
 
10.  Contingent  Worker  acknowledges  that  Genpact  may  be  subject to  certain  laws  and 
regulations regarding the privacy and protection of certain information to which Contingent 
Worker will obtain or to which he/she will have access, and that any receipt or use of such 
information by Contingent Worker may also be subject to compliance with such laws and 
regulations. Additionally, Contingent Worker will immediately notify Genpact in writing if, in 
the course of providing services to Genpact, Contingent Worker has obtained or will obtain 
access to individually identifiable health information (“protected health information” or “PHI”),

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

pageContent:
the course of providing services to Genpact, Contingent Worker has obtained or will obtain 
access to individually identifiable health information (“protected health information” or “PHI”), 
as defined by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996, as amended 
from  time  to  time  (“HIPAA”).  PHI  includes,  without  limitation, health  information  that 
identifies or could be used to identify an individual if such information relates to (a) the past, 
present or future physical or mental health condition of an individual; (b) the provision of health 
care to an individual or (c) the past, present or future payment for the provision of health care 
to an individual. Contingent Worker acknowledges and agrees that Contingent Worker will be 
subject to the terms and conditions of any Business Associate Agreement entered into by 
Genpact with a third party pertaining to PHI.

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

pageContent:
subject to the terms and conditions of any Business Associate Agreement entered into by 
Genpact with a third party pertaining to PHI.  
 
11. Contingent Worker acknowledges that any threatened or actual breach of the Agreement 
will be dealt with stringently and amount to material breach of this Agreement.  Genpact 
reserves the right to take appropriate action as per the laws of the land against the Contingent 
Worker, without prejudice to any other rights.  
 
12.With regard to the Work Product  Contingent Worker agrees as under:- 
 
i. Without Genpact’s written consent, Contingent Worker will not use the 
name, service marks, or trademarks of Genpact or any of its affiliated 
companies or reveal the existence of this Agreement or the terms or 
conditions thereof.  
ii. Contingent Worker assigns to Genpact all ownership, assignment and Work 
Product  rights  (including  patent  rights  and  worldwide  copyright)  in  all

metadata.source: /tmp/resume-processor-SoN0mW/Schedule 6.1 Contingent Worker NonDisclosure and Assignment of Work Product Agreement.pdf

conditions thereof.  
ii. Contingent Worker assigns to Genpact all ownership, assignment and Work 
Product  rights  (including  patent  rights  and  worldwide  copyright)  in  all 
patentable or copyrightable ideas, writings, drawings, inventions, designs, 
parts,    machines  or  processes  (including  software  codes)  of  Contingent 
Worker’s original creation, and all modifications of or additions to any 
Genpact  program  performed  pursuant  to  any  agreement  between  the 
undersigned  and  Genpact,  and  all  other  work  product  (including 
documentation) furnished to Genpact under any such agreement, whether 
such assigned materials are in existence on the date of this assignment or are 
authored subsequent to said date. This assignment is effective as of the date 
of the creation of any copyrightable works as described herein, and is for the 
maximum term permitted by law for copyright assignment.

iii. At the behest of Genpact, Contingent Worker will cooperate with all lawful 
efforts of Genpact to register, protect and enforce this assignment  with 
respect to the claims of any third party, including executing all appropriate

v. Not to disclose or utilize in his/her work with Genpact any proprietary or

employers or associates), any open source code, shareware, malicious code 
or disabling devices such as virus, worm, spyware, adware, etc., or any

viii. Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed as a license or right to use any 
Work product or Confidential information given to the Contingent Worker 
by Genpact, except for the express purpose of employment. 
 
13.  Contingent Worker agrees to adhere to the a) Genpact’s Integrity@Genpact Policy of the 
Company and Code of Conduct attached hereto. The Contingent Worker also acknowledges to 
have read and understood the a) Genpact Privacy and Information Security policy b) Genpact 
Acceptable Use Policy attached hereto as Schedule 7.8.2.
  
 
Additionally, Contingent Worker shall comply with Genpact’s and/or its customer’s standard 
policies and procedures as made known to the Contingent Worker from time to time, including 
all such policies relating to safe work environment. 
 
In addition to any requirements set forth in this Agreement and any Appendix attached hereto,

In addition to any requirements set forth in this Agreement and any Appendix attached hereto, 
Contingent Worker who are provided access to a facility and related administrative support 
services and/or equipment of Genpact’s Customers (or of Genpact’s) information technology 
systems, including but not limited to hardware, software or websites, in connection with the 
performance of Services, shall comply with Customer’s policies and code of conduct , property 
rules regarding security, access and use thereof. Such facility, administrative support services 
and  information  technology  systems  shall  only  be  used  by  Contingent  Worker  for  the 
performance of Services.   
 
14. No term or provision hereof will be deemed waived and no breach will be excused. 
However, any consent by Genpact to, or waiver of, a breach by Contingent Worker, whether

pageContent:
15. Any provision of this Agreement which is prohibited or unenforceable in any jurisdiction 
will, as to such jurisdiction, be ineffective to the extent of such prohibition or unenforceability  
without invalidating the remaining provisions hereof. Any such prohibition or unenforceability 
in any jurisdiction will not invalidate or render unenforceable such provision in any other 
jurisdiction.  
 
16.  Contingent Worker agrees and acknowledges that nothing in this Agreement shall be 
construed to create a joint venture, partnership, association, employment relationship or other 
affiliation between the Parties.  It is agreed that this relationship is and shall remain that of  
 
independent parties to the contractual relationship set forth in the Agreement.  It is also agreed 
that should there be a conflict between this Agreement and any agreement with the Supplier 
which placed Contingent Worker with Genpact, this Agreement shall control.

that should there be a conflict between this Agreement and any agreement with the Supplier 
which placed Contingent Worker with Genpact, this Agreement shall control. 
 
17. Nothing contained in this Agreement will be construed as granting, conferring, or implying 
any rights by license or otherwise. 
 
18. This Agreement shall remain in full force and effect, and, except as hereby amended, is 
ratified and confirmed. Contingent Worker understands his/her obligations under the terms of 
this Agreement, including but not limited to, agreeing that he/she will keep confidential all 
Confidential Information forever. 
 
  
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties by their duly authorized representatives have caused this 
Agreement to be executed as of the date first written above.
